resources.string: Notification that visualises progress of image scan

ImageFind lets you search the text in your images. Before you can do that, the app need to process the images.
To do so, click the "New Scan" button and in the multiple choice menu select the folders from which the images will be scaned.

Rescanning the same folder again will find new images and update older ones, if changes have been made to them.

Scan time depends on the devices CPU and the number of selected images, it could take a while.
To process new images, the app needs access to device storage!
To process new images the app needs access to device storage! Without it scanning new images won\'t work.
